title: Bitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System
author: Satoshi Nakamoto
excerpt: The foundational paper introducing Bitcoin and the concept of decentralized consensus via Proof of Work.

title: Dynamo: Amazon's Highly Available Key-value Store
author: DeCandia et al.
excerpt: Introduces the architectural principles of eventual consistency and consistent hashing used in NoSQL databases.

title: Attention Is All You Need
author: Vaswani et al.
excerpt: The seminal paper that introduced the Transformer architecture, revolutionizing natural language processing.
